Nerangs.ab: ... aṣ̌a.ciθra āiiese xšnūmaine sraōšahe aṣ̌iiehe taxmahe tanu.mąϑrahe darši.draōš āhūiriiehe aōxtō.nāmanō yazatahe az iməm haōməm tā ō ī aṣ̌a.ciθra čīyōn nibišt tā xšnūman kē bēd guftan ud harw dō bār sāzišn hāmag xūb bē nigerišn ud bōy ō ī ātaxš dahišn agar xšnūman čiš-ē dudigar bēd čīyōn pad xšnūmaine rasēnd ān ī kart ēstēd bē gōwišn agar ahlawān frawahr bēd auuaŋ́hā̊ frauuaṣ̌aiiō…

"... aṣ̌a.ciθra āiiese xšnūmaine sraōšahe aṣ̌iiehe taxmahe tanu.mąϑrahe darši.draōš āhūiriiehe aōxtō.nāmanō yazatahe. They have to recite (again) from iməm haōməm until aṣ̌a.ciθra as it has been written until the corresponding šnūman. Each of the two times he has to gaze carefully at all implements and bring bōy to the fire. If the šnūman is any other one, when they arrive at xšnūmaine, they have to recite the one that has been performed. If it is the one of ahlawān fawahr, (they have to recite:) ā y auuaŋ́hā̊ frauuaṣ̌aiiō…"
